import React, {useState} from 'react' import { useNavigate, Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Button, Row, Col, ListGroup, Image, Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import Message from '../components/Message' import CheckoutSteps from '../components/CheckoutSteps' function PlaceOrderScreen() { const cart = useSelector( state => state.cart) return (

Shipping

Shipping: {cart.shippingAddress.address}, {cart.shippingAddress.city}, {' '} {cart.shippingAddress.postalCode} {' '} {cart.shippingAddress.country}

Payment Method

Method: {cart.paymentMethod}

) } export default PlaceOrderScreen
